$interpreted: Escaping Commoner: Shhhh. The monsters might hear us. The soldiers told us the monsters are on the other side of the barrier, but we still can't be certain.
Frightened Commoner: I can't take this anymore...I've got to get out of this country...
Sophie: There's not a single smile in sight...
Hutchinson: That's quite understandable, wouldn't you say?
Sophie: I disagree. This is the perfect place for a performance.
Sophie: Hanbei, Hutchinson, Ru-yi, get the props ready. It's time —— for an impromptu show of Morgan's Marvelous Circus!
Hanbei: We get it, we get it. Hey, let's get ready.
Ru-yi: Hanbei, why aren't you getting angry and complaining this time?
Hutchinson: Yes, my good lad. It's quite rare that you listen to Sophie's commands.
Hanbei: You think I wanna!? It's just...
Hanbei: My old buddy, Morgan...he used to always say, "When you're down, you've got to laugh even harder"...
Hanbei: Thinking of what old Morgan would do...how can I complain?
Hutchinson: ...Indeed. I feel the same way.
Ru-yi: ...Yeah!
Sophie: This...this is the prop Rune used the first time he performed with us.
Sophie: Rune...you better be safe...
Elite Lizard Squad: An order from the Queen. We'll cover you! This mission must succeed!
Elite Lizard Squad: We got this! Now get out of here!
Clark: You...!
Elite Lizard Squad: We don't understand this rune nonsense. We'll leave that up to you. We may not like you humans...
Elite Lizard Squad: ...but we're asking you to please save our country!
Elite Lizard Squad: GO!!!
Elite Lizard Squad: YAHHHHHH!!!!!!
Rune: No. Going back.
Clark: ......
Clark: ......Wait a sec...this pond is way too big. We've got to destroy it all? This is gonna be impossible...
Rune: Allow me...
Clark: We did it!! Great job, Rune!
Maria: G-G-G-G-G-G-G-G-G-G-Good job!
Rune: ...*grunts*...now let's go...
Clark: We've been found!
Devious: Ah, yesssss. The dregs of society.
Devious: That barrier of wind was merely icing on the cake. It's a real pity that the show was stopped, but it doesn't really matter.
Clark: Devious, what was the point of setting up that wind barrier anyway?
Devious: Hsssss. Curious, are you? I suppose it wouldn't hurt to tell you.
Devious: My precious babies are swallowing up Soul Energy as we speak. The barrier is merely a way to round up their prey.
Clark: The ceremony...was a trap!?
Devious: Hsssss. If I don't make an excuse for the bumbling citizens, how else am I going to gather all of them in one place?
Clark: Unfortunately for you, Rune has put an end to all this. Your plan's been foiled!
Devious: I ought to thank you for destroying the barrier.
Devious: Those little fishies that slipped through the net with the queen...well, they can sit tight.  My babies will find their way to the Old City eventually.
Rune: ...Sophie!
Devious: Don't waste your breath. You're already too late, hssssssssss!!!!
Ru-yi: Sophie, we-we-we've got to get out of here! The troops can't hold out for much longer...
Hanbei: We've bit off more than we can chew! We can't help anyone else, so we might as well save ourselves!
Hutchinson: They're right. This is already out of our control.
Sophie: I...I know...eh!?
Sophie: (Oh no...even if I try to make it over there, I may not make it...if I do that, not only will I die, I won't even be able to help those children...)
Sophie: ...But...
Sophie: (...How ironic...so this is how it's gonna be...if there's even a sliver of a chance...)
Sophie: (...I know it's stupid, but I'm willing to risk it all...after all...that's the magic of hope...)
Sophie: After everything I've said...I'm gonna do exactly what dad did.
Sophie: Dad was right...
Sophie: The world needs fools like us.
Sophie: Sorry, Rune...I'm going to have to break our promise.

No. Going back.

We've bit off more than we can chew! We can't help anyone else, so we might as well save ourselves!

I...I know...eh!?
(Oh no...even if I try to make it over there, I may not make it...if I do that, not only will I die, I won't even be able to help those children...)
(...How ironic...so this is how it's gonna be...if there's even a sliver of a chance...)
(...I know it's stupid, but I'm willing to risk it all...after all...that's the magic of hope...)
After everything I've said...I'm gonna do exactly what dad did.
Dad was right...
The world needs fools like us.
Sorry, Rune...I'm going to have to break our promise.
